SEARCH
Module org.microbean.lang
Package org.microbean.lang

Class CompletionLock

java.lang.Object
org.microbean.lang.CompletionLock
public final class CompletionLock extends Object
A utility class logically containing a single Lock that is used to guard against concurrent symbol completion.

The javax.lang.model.* classes make no guarantees about thread safety. Certain operations on TypeMirror and Element, particularly TypeMirror.getKind() and Element.getKind() operations, will result in symbol completion, which may involve modification of the TypeMirror or Element in question. It is imperative that this modification be performed under global lock if thread safety is to be preserved, and that is the function of this class.

Note that DelegatingTypeMirror and DelegatingElement automatically perform such locking, and all operations in Lang that could result in symbol completion also perform such locking.

Author:
Laird Nelson

    Method
    Description
    static final Lock
    acquire()
    Calls lock() on the global Lock and returns it.

    guard(Runnable r)
    Calls acquire(), then run() on the supplied Supplier, then release() in a finally block.
    static final boolean
    guard(BooleanSupplier s)
    Calls acquire(), then get() on the supplied BooleanSupplier, then release() in a finally block, and returns the result of the getAsBoolean() invocation.

    • acquire

      public static final Lock acquire()
      Calls lock() on the global Lock and returns it.
      Returns:
      the locked Lock; never null
      See Also:
      • release()

    • release

      public static final Lock release()
      Calls unlock() on the global Lock and returns it.
      Returns:
      the unlocked Lock; never null
      See Also:
      • acquire()

    • guard

      public static final <T> T guard(Supplier<? extends T> s)
      Calls acquire(), then get() on the supplied Supplier, then release() in a finally block, and returns the result of the get() invocation.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the object this method will return
      Parameters:
      s - a Supplier; must not be null
      Returns:
      the result of an invocation of the supplied Supplier's get() method, which may be null
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if s is null

    • guard

      public static final boolean guard(BooleanSupplier s)
      Calls acquire(), then get() on the supplied BooleanSupplier, then release() in a finally block, and returns the result of the getAsBoolean() invocation.
      Parameters:
      s - a BooleanSupplier; must not be null
      Returns:
      the result of an invocation of the supplied BooleanSupplier's getAsBoolean() method
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if s is null

      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if r is null
